abstract: Ken Jaworowski reviews documentary film A Brave Heart: The Lizzie Velasquez Story, directed by Sara Hirsh Bordo.
lead_paragraph: Sara Hirsh Bordo, directing her first feature, keeps the scenes bright and fast-moving, but several important topics about Ms. Velasquez are are barely addressed.

headline.main: Review: ‘A Brave Heart: The Lizzie Velasquez Story,’ One Woman’s Push for Acceptance
headline.print_headline: Review: ‘A Brave Heart: The Lizzie Velasquez Story,’ One Woman’s Push for Acceptance

snippet: Sara Hirsh Bordo, directing her first feature, keeps the scenes bright and fast-moving, but several important topics about Ms. Velasquez are are barely addressed.
